name: pushsocket.js
description: An Open-Sourced remix of SimpleSocket, built from Scratch.

scripts.push:docs: cd /home/runner/PushSocket/repo2 && git config --global user.email "contact@myxapk.tech" && git config --global user.name "NullClock" && git add . && git commit -m "docs: Deploy docs" && git push -u origin master
scripts.push: cd /home/runner/PushSocket/  && git config --global user.email "contact@myxapk.tech" && git config --global user.name "NullClock" && git add . && git commit -m "Push PushSocket from Replit" && git push
scripts.push:npm: npm login && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm --no-git-tag-version publish

author: XAPK Enterprises
